questions.question: Considering the overall form, what is the primary shape of this wheeled luggage?

Based on visual inspection, what material appears to constitute the suitcase's shell?
Focusing on the wheels, how many are visibly present on this rolling suitcase?
What is the apparent material of the handle and zipper components?
What is the visual texture of the outer shell; is it smooth or rough?
Judging by the image, what is the apparent size of this checked luggage?
What kind of carrying handle is present, and what is its placement on the luggage?
Do you see any visible logos, labels, or branding details on this suitcase?
Are there any noticeable protective feet or bumpers on the bottom of this suitcase?

Visually inspecting the wheels, what is their apparent construction material?
Does this suitcase appear to possess any external pockets or compartments?

Considering the visual details, is the finish of the suitcase matte or glossy?
